alert.note: Alert for Atchison; Holt; Nodaway (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 12 at 10:45PM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Doniphan, southeastern Atchison, northwestern Holt and west central Nodaway Counties through 1115 PM CDT... At 1045 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Craig, or 10 miles northeast of Falls City, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Mound City, Fairfax, Craig, White Cloud, Big Lake, Fortescue, Bigelow, Corning and Indian Cave State Park. This includes Interstate 29 between mile markers 83 and 104. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 100 AM CDT for northeastern Kansas...and northwestern Missouri.
